titles.title: Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Twelfth Congress.

action.text: Mr. Ellison asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/17/2010--Passed House without amendment. Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 112th Congress to be printed as a House document, including 3,000 additional copies.
